author: I N
comment: Doesn't work for music reliably. You have to tap 10 times the button and maybe it'll recognize one if those 10 times. Most probably it won't

author: Tom Cuthbertson
comment: The new update has the top and bottom buttons half off the screen due to the shape of the moto 360. Pressing play opens the music player but doesn't actually play the music. There's no chance people will pay £2.50 for a theme for this app.

reply.author: ShakeJ
reply.content:
Hi Thanks for reply!
1. I dont have moto 360. please take a picture and send mail shakejj@gmail.com. I will fix that :)
2. press open player and once again press then play the music :)
3. What means no chance? mean price too high? or error?

title: Used to be a good app for the Moto 360

author: Ettercap
comment: Based on the rating I almost didn't even install it... Seriously people? It works well for me, I'm on Lollipop 5.1.1 its also free what is wrong with you people?? Should lower the donation 5$ is a bit much, I'd donate $1 if I could.
title: Almost didn't install

comment: It does what it's supposed to. Only drawback is, you have to open the music on your phone first.  Edit...  As I write this, I noticed that pressing play button on watch while music plays, causes the song to start over again rather than pick up from where it was stopped.

reply.author: ShakeJ
reply.content: Updated new version , Thanks :) Not open music player, auto open it!

author: Jonathan Jones
comment: Open the app on your watch. Just try it. It works. Faster than Wear Music Controller, though not sure if the WiFi button works, however this is an added feature anyway, the main functionality is fine.

comment: Its a great app, works with my music very well. The only thing that I would request is a pause button. If you give us a pause button I will give you a guaranteed five stars. :)

reply.content:
In application, play button means "toggle". 
If music playing, click play button then pause :) 
Thank you for reply.

title: Its great but...

author: Rich H
comment: It adds no more functionality than the buttons that appear on my watch when playing tracks on my phone, except they are more colourful. UPDATE: To developer, I never said it didn't work, it does, it just does the same job as the built in music control, so as I said in the title, it is pointless!!

reply.author: ShakeJ
reply.content:
Please 2.2.1 update! 
Support lollipop (above Android 5.0), and new feature "Wifi On/Off"
Thanks :)
